SEARCH
Package ru.introguzzle.parsers.xml.mapping.serialization

Interface Bindable

public interface Bindable
An interface representing an object that can be bound to a XMLMapper for serialization. It provides a default implementation of the XMLMapper::toXMLDocument method, which returns null by default.

When implementing this interface, inheritor should override the Bindable::toXMLDocument method to enable proper serialization by the XMLMapper. To ensure that the default behavior is utilized and to allow for dynamic method replacement by the mapper, override the method as follows:


 @Override
 public XMLDocument toXMLDocument() {
     return Bindable.super.toXMLDocument();
 }

This approach allows the XML mapper to inject or replace the implementation of XMLMapper::toXMLDocument at runtime, facilitating the serialization process without introducing compile-time dependencies on the mapper's internal implementation.

    default XMLDocument
    toXMLDocument()
    Converts this object to XMLDocument
